snippet: The attackers set off a car bomb, then killed four of the prison guards and wounded seven others in a shootout.
abstract: Taliban fighters attack Ghazni prison freeing 351 of 436 prisoners, including 148 Taliban terrorists charged with national security crimes; early morning jail break, set off by car bomb, killed four prison guards and wounded seven others in subsequent shootout.
lead_paragraph: The attackers set off a car bomb, then killed four of the prison guards and wounded seven others in a shootout.

headline.main: Taliban Raid Frees Hundreds of Inmates From Prison
headline.print_headline: Taliban Raid Frees Scores From Prison
